item.title: Enabling analysis of research software: Creating an enhanced research software corpus
item.description: CW21 Hack Day - 2021-03-31 to 2021-04-01 Batey-1941 - HP2-CW21 Hack Day idea proposer Neil Chue Hong and Stephan Druskat This document should be used to capture the information for a Hack Day Idea. Idea name (provisional) This is the provisional name of the Idea, solution or just a title; this can be changed later if a team is formed and you decide on a new team/product name. Enabling analysis of research software: Creating an enhanced research software corpus
